body: A sandman gains a bonus equal to half his level on Bluff, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth checks. He may also disarm magical traps with Disable Device as a rogue's trapfinding ability. This ability replaces bardic knowledge.
name: Master of Deception
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Bard/Bard Archetypes/Sandman/Master of Deception
